abstract: Prosecutors and defense lawyers make closing arguments in murder trial of James E Holmes for 2012 massacre in Aurora, Colo, movie theater; prosecutors are seeking death penalty, while Holmes's defense hopes jury will find him not guilty by reason of insanity.
lead_paragraph: After wrenching testimony from 250 witnesses, prosecutors and defense lawyers each made their two-hour closing arguments in James E. Holmes’s murder trial on Tuesday.

headline.main: Both Sides Deliver Closing Arguments in Colorado Shooting Trial
headline.print_headline: Sides Deliver Last Words in Trial of Suspect in Colorado Shootings

snippet: After wrenching testimony from 250 witnesses, prosecutors and defense lawyers each made their two-hour closing arguments in James E. Holmes’s murder trial on Tuesday.
